title: tcksift2
description:
Optimise per-streamline cross-section multipliers to match a whole-brain tractogram to fixel-wise fibre densities.



References:

Smith, R. E.; Tournier, J.-D.; Calamante, F. & Connelly, A. SIFT2: Enabling dense quantitative assessment of brain white matter connectivity using streamlines tractography. NeuroImage, 2015, 119, 338-351

* If using the -linear option: 
Smith, RE; Raffelt, D; Tournier, J-D; Connelly, A. Quantitative Streamlines Tractography: Methods and Inter-Subject Normalisation. Open Science Framework, https://doi.org/10.31219/osf.io/c67kn.

proc_mask.title: proc_mask
proc_mask.description: provide an image containing the processing mask weights for the model; image spatial dimensions must match the fixel image

act.title: act
act.description: use an ACT five-tissue-type segmented anatomical image to derive the processing mask

fd_scale_gm.title: fd_scale_gm
fd_scale_gm.description: provide this option (in conjunction with -act) to heuristically downsize the fibre density estimates based on the presence of GM in the voxel. This can assist in reducing tissue interface effects when using a single-tissue deconvolution algorithm

no_dilate_lut.title: no_dilate_lut
no_dilate_lut.description: do NOT dilate FOD lobe lookup tables; only map streamlines to FOD lobes if the precise tangent lies within the angular spread of that lobe

make_null_lobes.title: make_null_lobes
make_null_lobes.description: add an additional FOD lobe to each voxel, with zero integral, that covers all directions with zero / negative FOD amplitudes

remove_untracked.title: remove_untracked
remove_untracked.description: remove FOD lobes that do not have any streamline density attributed to them; this improves filtering slightly, at the expense of longer computation time (and you can no longer do quantitative comparisons between reconstructions if this is enabled)

fd_thresh.title: fd_thresh
fd_thresh.description: fibre density threshold; exclude an FOD lobe from filtering processing if its integral is less than this amount (streamlines will still be mapped to it, but it will not contribute to the cost function or the filtering)

csv.title: csv
csv.description: output statistics of execution per iteration to a .csv file

out_mu.title: out_mu
out_mu.description: output the final value of SIFT proportionality coefficient mu to a text file

output_debug.title: output_debug
output_debug.description: provide various output images for assessing & debugging performance etc.

out_coeffs.title: out_coeffs
out_coeffs.description: output text file containing the weighting coefficient for each streamline

reg_tikhonov.title: reg_tikhonov
reg_tikhonov.description: provide coefficient for regularising streamline weighting coefficients (Tikhonov regularisation) (default: 0)

reg_tv.title: reg_tv
reg_tv.description: provide coefficient for regularising variance of streamline weighting coefficient to fixels along its length (Total Variation regularisation) (default: 0.1)

min_td_frac.title: min_td_frac
min_td_frac.description: minimum fraction of the FOD integral reconstructed by streamlines; if the reconstructed streamline density is below this fraction, the fixel is excluded from optimisation (default: 0.1)

min_iters.title: min_iters
min_iters.description: minimum number of iterations to run before testing for convergence; this can prevent premature termination at early iterations if the cost function increases slightly (default: 10)

max_iters.title: max_iters
max_iters.description: maximum number of iterations to run before terminating program

min_factor.title: min_factor
min_factor.description: minimum weighting factor for an individual streamline; if the factor falls below this number the streamline will be rejected entirely (factor set to zero) (default: 0)

min_coeff.title: min_coeff
min_coeff.description: minimum weighting coefficient for an individual streamline; similar to the '-min_factor' option, but using the exponential coefficient basis of the SIFT2 model; these parameters are related as: factor = e^(coeff). Note that the -min_factor and -min_coeff options are mutually exclusive - you can only provide one. (default: -inf)

max_factor.title: max_factor
max_factor.description: maximum weighting factor that can be assigned to any one streamline (default: inf)

max_coeff.title: max_coeff
max_coeff.description: maximum weighting coefficient for an individual streamline; similar to the '-max_factor' option, but using the exponential coefficient basis of the SIFT2 model; these parameters are related as: factor = e^(coeff). Note that the -max_factor and -max_coeff options are mutually exclusive - you can only provide one. (default: inf)

max_coeff_step.title: max_coeff_step
max_coeff_step.description: maximum change to a streamline's weighting coefficient in a single iteration (default: 1)

min_cf_decrease.title: min_cf_decrease
min_cf_decrease.description: minimum decrease in the cost function (as a fraction of the initial value) that must occur each iteration for the algorithm to continue (default: 2.5e-05)

linear.title: linear
linear.description: perform a linear estimation of streamline weights, rather than the standard non-linear optimisation (typically does not provide as accurate a model fit; but only requires a single pass)

quiet.title: quiet
quiet.description: do not display information messages or progress status; alternatively, this can be achieved by setting the MRTRIX_QUIET environment variable to a non-empty string.

force.title: force
force.description: force overwrite of output files (caution: using the same file as input and output might cause unexpected behaviour).

nthreads.title: nthreads
nthreads.description: use this number of threads in multi-threaded applications (set to 0 to disable multi-threading).

key.title: key
key.description: temporarily set the value of an MRtrix config file entry.

value.title: value
value.description: temporarily set the value of an MRtrix config file entry.

items.title: config
items.description: temporarily set the value of an MRtrix config file entry.

config.title: config
config.description: temporarily set the value of an MRtrix config file entry.

help.title: help
help.description: display this information page and exit.

in_fod.title: in_fod
in_fod.description: input image containing the spherical harmonics of the fibre orientation distributions

out_weights.title: out_weights
out_weights.description: output text file containing the weighting factor for each streamline
